name: The Adventures Of Meguer
description: Hello, if you are here and because you want to know how little Meguer's adventures, well he is still a child, but he has a brilliant mind ..... finally his mother was raped, and to find out who raped him, he needs the help of his friend Lowd ..... to find out more about this big adventure ..... run the game online or download it on your computer ...... see you there
